issue.title: [CF 1257] Last Ability Used does not work
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Create an animation notification for an icon
2. Set an On Condition
3. Set the condition for Last Ability Used (I used Blessed Hammer)

What do you expect to happen?
When using the condition spell (in my example Blessed Hammer), the animation should trigger.

What happens instead?
The animation does not trigger.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
8.1.1-5-g696770f

Do you have an error log of what happened?
No.

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)


> Posted by CurseForge user HawkBat85 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1257 | Raw

comments.body:
